descriptionMdByRank.1: Increase ATK by **12%**. While the wielder is on the field, using Resonance Skill grants **12%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 times for 6s. At 3 stacks or above, casting Outro Skill consumes all stacks of this effect and grants the wielder **52%** Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 27s, effective when the wielder is off the field.
